tooltip.title: Tooltip
tooltip.subtitle: Tooltip component displayed on hover or click over an element. Used to provide additional information or context to the user

basic.title: Basic Example
basic.description: Minimal tooltip configuration with text content

placement.title: Placement
placement.description: Positioning tooltip relative to trigger element: top, bottom, left or right, with alignment to start, center or end

trigger.title: Triggers
trigger.description: Tooltip activation mode: on hover or on click. Default trigger is hover

autoHide.title: Auto Hide
autoHide.description: By default tooltip hides when cursor leaves trigger element. When `autoHide` is set to false, tooltip stays visible while cursor is over tooltip content

delay.title: Delays
delay.description: Configure delays before showing (`showDelay`) and hiding (`hideDelay`) tooltip for smoother interaction

template.title: Custom Templates
template.description: Using `content` slot to display custom tooltip content, including icons, formatted text and other elements

triggerSlot.title: Trigger Slot
triggerSlot.description: Using `trigger` slot to customize trigger element with access to tooltip state (`isOpen`, `open`, `close`)

controlled.title: Controlled Mode
controlled.description: Control tooltip visibility externally via `show` prop and `show`/`hide` events for full state control

rootEl.title: Using rootEl
rootEl.description: Explicitly specify trigger element via `rootEl` prop for cases when tooltip must be detached from trigger in DOM

argTypes.content: Tooltip text displayed inside tooltip. Can be overridden via `content` slot
argTypes.show: Controls tooltip visibility. In controlled mode used to manage open/close state
argTypes.rootEl: DOM element reference relative to which tooltip is positioned. Used to explicitly define trigger element
argTypes.placement: Tooltip position relative to trigger element: top, bottom (default), left, right
argTypes.align: Tooltip alignment relative to trigger element: start, center (default), end
argTypes.trigger: Tooltip activation mode: hover (default) or click
argTypes.offset: Distance in pixels between trigger element and tooltip. Default is 0. When arrow is present, distance is automatically increased by arrow size
argTypes.boundaryPadding: Minimum padding in pixels from screen edges when positioning tooltip to prevent overflow. Default is 5
argTypes.zIndex: Z-index value for tooltip. Default is 2000
argTypes.maxWidth: Maximum tooltip width in pixels or CSS units. If exceeded, content wraps to next line. Default is 200
argTypes.teleportTo: CSS selector or DOM element where tooltip is teleported (Vue Teleport). Default is "body". Set to false to disable teleport
argTypes.autoHide: By default tooltip hides when cursor leaves trigger. When false, tooltip stays visible while cursor is over it. Default is true
argTypes.showDelay: Delay in milliseconds before showing tooltip on hover. Default is 0
argTypes.hideDelay: Delay in milliseconds before hiding tooltip when cursor leaves. Default is 0
argTypes.durationEnter: Duration of tooltip appearance animation in milliseconds. Default is 300
argTypes.durationLeave: Duration of tooltip disappearance animation in milliseconds. Default is 0
argTypes.default: Main slot for trigger element. If `trigger` slot is not used, default content becomes trigger
argTypes.content: Slot for custom tooltip content. Allows displaying formatted text, icons and other elements instead of plain `content` text
argTypes.trigger: Slot to customize trigger element. Provides: isOpen (open state), open (open function), close (close function)
argTypes.hide: Event fired when tooltip is hidden
argTypes.show: Event fired when tooltip is shown
